name: Spinshot Hockey
description:
A game jam entry for Minimalistic Jam 2!

Recommend played with Firefox or Safari (Mac), may have slower framerate in Chrome : / . If the keyboard isn't responding, try to hit refresh!

It is air hockey meets table/rod hockey.  Slide around the ice, spin your player to shot the puck.  First team to 3 goals wins, no time limit (as I ran out of development time before the end of the jam heh).

Controls...
WSAD (or arrows) - move player
< > (aka comma period) - rotate player

Built using Cerberus X and Box2D in HTML5.
https://www.cerberus-x.com/
http://box2d.org/
